website_summaries.verdict: A great pick for customers seeking a sturdy, adjustable stroller organizer.
pros: Velcro straps are adjustable, making this bag a nearly universal stroller fit
Includes a wristlet that can be zipped off product
cons: A few buyers had issues with their drinks spilling out of the organizer

customer_reviews.title: Holds more than expected
customer_reviews.text: Way better than I thought it would be. It’s a great organizer for a small stroller. I use it on my baby jogger city tour stroller and it’s perfect. It folds up small with the stroller and can cary two large bubba drink cups along with our phones, maps, travel guides, croissants, coins, and sunscreen. I even have used it to transport flowers. I like it better than the organizers that have a top cover. And the little pouch is great for coins or cash and fits an apple iphone xs max...barely.
customer_reviews.author: Serena

customer_reviews.title: A Very Necessary Addition
customer_reviews.text: I bought an umbrella stroller for travel. It came with a single small cup holder, so I bought this stroller organizer. On our first trip, we took our daughter to Disneyland and this came in handy. It held her water, milk, 3 pairs of sunglasses, an external charger for our phones, and snacks. It also held up when we gate-checked the stroller. We were running extremely late and I was too frazzled to remember to put the stroller in the gate-check bag. It was still there on the other end of our flight looking as good as new.
customer_reviews.author: P. Wang

customer_reviews.title: It probably only has a few more good months before it completely rips apart
customer_reviews.text: I bought this last June and it's already falling apart. It's ripped from the seams which attaches the loops to the stroller. It probably only has a few more good months before it completely rips apart. The front zipper is a great idea, however if you put more than 3-4 things in it, the weight pulls the zipper apart and its unzipped and fallen onto the floor several times already. I will purchase a similar product by a different company to replace this one. Hopefully it will last longer.
customer_reviews.author: C. Anders

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer BUT.. everything falls out
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good organizer, especially since it has a little pouch you can zip off. However, every time I fold my stroller, I have to either take it off or take the seat off the stroller or else everything just falls out of the organizer. Kind of a pain either way because the stroller seat is heavy but then taking off the organizer is also a pain because you have to take off the Velcro and then loop it through again when putting it back on
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good organizer for umbrella stroller
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 organizers to compare on an umbrella type of stroller and decided to keep this one. Definitely fits the best with this type of stroller. Slim, lays well, and gives me just enough extra space. I do think this would be perfect if it had a mesh bag that rolls down like others I've seen, and if there was a better place to store your phone. There's no real place for a phone other than throwing it in the main center compartment that doesn't close. I am going to try and add my own little mesh pocket somewhere. They should also add a snap or velcro closure at least for certain compartment.
customer_reviews.author: Typical Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great but prone to spills
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little caddy, I love that is big enough to hold my 32 oz hydroflask! Good quality. My only complaint is if you have a drink in it that’s not in a sealed container (like a cup of soda from a restaurant) it’s pretty prone to spilling it because it’s fabric and moves with the stroller. It spilled a soda allllll over while I was walking, but it was so easy to clean so it was all good. I would just use only with hard cups/bottles with a good lid.
customer_reviews.author: JacksonEsplin

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: Of all the stroller organizers out there, this one is my favorite. It has two deep cup holders and an equally deep center compartment, plus the zip away change purse is super convenient. It’s also wide enough that it fits most stroller handlebars perfectly (I’ve had it on a Chicco Bravo, Babytrend Expedition jogger and now a Chicco Liteway umbrella style). This is my second one. I have one on my jogger and now I have one on my umbrella stroller. Can’t stroll without it!
customer_reviews.author: Dodger Mom

customer_reviews.title: Does everything I need
customer_reviews.text: I read some mediocre reviews of this organizer so I wasn't sure if I'd like it. The main compartment holds my husband's wallet, both of our giant iPhones, and our car keys while still leaving room in each cup holder for drinks. You probably don't want to put a cup from a fast food place in the holders but bottled beverages work just fine in there (soppy cups would work too). Haven't used the zip off part yet but I could see if coming in handy. Fits great on my Moon Nuova stroller and doesn't have to be removed before collapsing the stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Great product, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: We used this when we went to Disney World this past summer. It worked out great. I was using it on Joovy Double Tandem stroller. I started with it on the handlebars, but it was low and every time my 3 year old got in or out it was in the way. I ended up moving it to the side of the stroller, which worked out great too. The straps make it very flexible. I also liked the zipper pouch that you can remove. I kept my phone and credit card in it and would just zip it off when we left the stroller somewhere. I would recommend this to others, it is great!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Brenner

customer_reviews.title: Strong hold straps
customer_reviews.text: I love that this is strong enough to hold on to my YoYo’s curved handle without slipping. I put it on and pulled the straps tightly, loaded it up, and tightened the straps a second time. What I thought was tight enough without stuff in it was a little too loose loaded up. If you look at the pic, there’s a large Starbucks iced tea in there. It’s roomy!
customer_reviews.author: Magpie

customer_reviews.title: very versatile and stylish as well as low key
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my wife to use on our Nuna Mixx 2 stroller. It is stylish and low key at the same time. It has enough storage for her and I as well as the baby. My wife loves the detachable piece that can be used as a wallet for the days she doesn't want to bring her purse or wallet and have bare essentials she like being able to detach and using it as a wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Akash

customer_reviews.title: One of the few organizers that fit my stroller
customer_reviews.text: I have a Mamas and Papas Armadillo flip. I tried three organizers. This organizer and the Britax organizer fit my stroller. I picked this over the Britax because I liked the shape of the cup holders and the open space between the two cup holders (Britax had a flap over that space). The Britax cup holders have a formed shaped, I like that the skip hop cup holders give me more flexibility. The open space between the two cup holders makes for easier access. I felt the flap on the Britax would get in the way. It sways a bit but I have hung it so it touches the back of the seat to prevent this.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect storage addition to an umbrella stroller
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to attach to an umbrella stroller for a trip to Disney World. It worked perfectly. It holds two drinks (coffee for both Mom and Dad) and there's a center section that worked well for random other stuff (tissue packs, wipes, hand sanitizer). It was the perfect thing to fill in the gap. We wanted to take a light weight umbrella stroller but we needed a little bit of storage space (mostly for drinks).
customer_reviews.author: SelinaB5

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver
customer_reviews.text: This item is such a life saver! Of course, women are not allowed to have pockets in their clothing, and since I don't carry a purse, I always have keys and a phone/wallet. This item has made my life so much easier than constantly digging for my wallet in the diaper bag in the bottom of the stroller. As I am pulling out my stroller, I throw my keys and wallet in this pouch and go. I love it so much, I bought another one for my husbands stroller to help make his life a little easier too. I highly recommend one of these organizers.
customer_reviews.author: Laura E Foster

customer_reviews.title: Another essential item for new mommy’s!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect stroller organizer! It’s sturdy and holds just the right amount of essential things I like to have at arms reach like my phone. I’d hate to keep taking my phone out of my bag every time I need it. I like how there’s a spare pocket that zips up which is perfect for storing some loose change or your keys. This is another must-have for new mommy’s!
customer_reviews.author: JourdyC.

customer_reviews.title: Not great for cups
customer_reviews.text: Would be good for umbrella styled strollers or maybe very narrow strollers if they exist. The securing straps aren't adjustable so on my Contours double stroller the product is positioned too high up by the stroller handle that it will not hold a drink in a cup without crushing or spilling/tipping as it is also a bit bunched up so not that easy to get into. Will hold water bottles but not upright, they hang at an odd angle.
customer_reviews.author: K. Wilkerson

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to a stroller
customer_reviews.text: Really useful. Fits and looks great on our Uppababy Vista stroller and does not get in the way of folding the stroller up. Holds two grande Starbucks drinks with ease, plus a phone/keys/whatever in the center compartment. The zip-off wallet is a nice idea but is a tight fit for a larger smartphone so I haven't really used it yet.
customer_reviews.author: In LA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is nice for strollers that dont have drink holders or pouches, or if you just need more. Attaches easily, made of really nice durable fabric, and is a great size. You can fit a lot in there. Keeps drinks more secure than I expected, too.
customer_reviews.author: MyPenNameTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great storage space!
customer_reviews.text: I use this on a couple different strollers and have liked it so far. I can’t quite get it to go perfectly taut between the handle on my Maxi-Cosi Zelia stroller, but it’s great on my Uppa Baby G-Luxe. Tons of storage space and pretty much matches everything.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Springsteen

customer_reviews.title: Extremely useful and stylish
customer_reviews.text: I personally have one of these and have purchased them as gifts for other mamas. The neoprene feels great and the black color hides any stains that may - oh who are we kidding - WILL occur when you have kiddos. I've used this stroller organizer with a Thule Chariot and a BOB Revolution - no problem attaching to either system. I love the removable zip-off section and the fact that this has 2 cup holder sections. Wish the cup holders were reinforced with plastic or some other rigid material, which would help with keeping beverages more stable.
customer_reviews.author: aswhalen

customer_reviews.title: Definitely beats toting a diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this. It is designed specifically to organize all the items that a parent or caregiver might need on a walk or outing of up to several hours -- 1-2 diapers, a packet of wipes, a changing pad, 1-2 bottles, spare nipple, pacifier, a small toy, a light change of clothes, and room for the parent or caregiver's coffee. Everything but the warmed bottles (and coffee) can be left attached to the stroller to be ready for a soothing stroll outside.
customer_reviews.author: predawnwalker

customer_reviews.title: Practical and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our uppa baby stroller & I love how easy it is to move around, as well as use! It's able to hold fairly large cups/bottles as well which is a huge plus
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: This is one of my best buys. This is my third child and I ...
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my best buys. This is my third child and I love this organizer! well made, well compartmentalized, I can't believe I didn't have one of these before! even if I have my diaper bag hanging on my stroller I use this organizer as it serves a different purpose - toss my keys and coffee in there and head out. Oh, dropped your binky? toss it in there. My older kid found a rock? toss it in there, and so on. I have never separated the front pouch, but it's nice to have. a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Yael L

customer_reviews.title: Beverage carrier just good for bottles
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and seems durable but we couldn’t fit our cafe coffee cups in this without fear of them spilling horribly or not being able to get them back out. It fits my water bottle okay but my hubs says it hits him in the groin. Maybe just practical for moms?
customer_reviews.author: Jen Belliss

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and perfect size
customer_reviews.text: This stroller organizer is well designed. It was simple to attach to my City Mini stroller, and the Velcro is sturdy. I like how the inside is divided into compartments, so that drinks stand up on the two sides and I have room in the center for my phone and wallet. The detachable feature looks like it will come in handy, I haven't used it yet but I've only gone on a few trips since I have added this organizer. I will most likely use it at the park, where I hate leaving valuables unattended but feel odd dragging an entire purse over to help my child on the slide.
customer_reviews.author: Di

customer_reviews.title: Fits great on Baby Jogger City Select
customer_reviews.text: Bought this stroller organizer for a Baby Jogger City Select. It fits perfectly, and can remain on the stroller when folded. It holds cups and water bottles well without them spilling or tipping over. My only complaint is that when it is on the handlebar it is stretched out a little and becomes kind of narrow, so you kind of have to wiggle a cup into it and stretch the fabric with one hand while sticking the cup in with the other hand.
customer_reviews.author: cmanning3

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure this is a great product for other strollers
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my uppababy vista stroller. Was trying to look for a stroller bar organizer that fits the uppababy and this was the only one I found. It's just ok. It would slide and get all crooked on the handle bars. It also would spill the contents when I would fold up my stroller. I'm sure this is a great product for other strollers, just not the greatest for the uppababy.
customer_reviews.author: Shoe_girl

customer_reviews.title: Can drinks spill
customer_reviews.text: Eh, wish I could return. The cup holders suck on this thing, I would only recommend using a drink with a lid. Tried cans and it spilt everywhere. Not great storage, wish I would of purchased something better.
customer_reviews.author: ks

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my stroller!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this organizer on my uppa baby stroller, which is lacking in storage space for my small items. It's great for keeping track of my phone and leaving it very accessible to me. Also great for wearing headphones, as the cord goes through the pouch. The larger open area holds my wallet, keys, water bottle, a small book/toy, and hand sanitizer. Definitely improves the functioning of my stroller. I don't have to bring a purse anymore.
customer_reviews.author: G. Skipper

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't compared this to similar products, but as far as I can tell, this is a durable, functional and sturdy product. Really like the zip off aspect so I can leave the sippy cup and water bottles behind, but keep my iPhone and keys with me when I park the stroller. Fabric is a high quality neoprene. There isn't a ton of storage space in the center pocket, but enough for a snack or change of underwear :). I use mine on a Phil and Ted Navigator and it fits just fine and is very easy to take on and off if needed.
customer_reviews.author: MCDel

customer_reviews.title: this item does not work well with my stroller. ...
customer_reviews.text: this item does not work well with my stroller. i have the Uppababy Vista and the organizer hangs very oddly when using the bassinet. if i put the straps on the side of the handle bar, the bassinet gets in the way. if i put the straps hanging from the top, then the organizer doesn't accommodate for a large water bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my umbrella stroler
customer_reviews.text: I bought a cheaper umbrella stroller as our “back-up” stroller, which lacked a good place to hold drinks, keys, etc. This was a fantastic solution and holds drinks with ease, and any other little items you need to take with you. It also has a nice convenient zip-off pouch you can use as a wallet.
customer_reviews.author: A. Trotter

customer_reviews.title: Best option I found
customer_reviews.text: I love this stroller organizer. I use it on my uppababy vista and it fits nicely. It’s adjustable so it would fit most strollers. It holds plenty and has a great zip-off wristlet included.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for the walker
customer_reviews.text: I love this little bag but I use it on the front bar of my walker. It works well inside and out and stays on when I fold the walker. The neoprene is stiff enough to easily support a water bottle or travel coffee mug on the sides and the center section holds a phone, kindle, tablet, and snacks. The outside zippered pocket is kinda useless for me. It's not really big enough to hold my cell phone & a small wallet. . That's the only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5.
customer_reviews.author: pafarmer

customer_reviews.title: Best universal stroller organizer
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use! Has adjustable Velcro so it fits your stroller perfectly! The material is neoprene so it’s easier to clean. It has three compartment inside which fits your venti size coffee for when your child is driving you crazy and you need enough “pick me up” to be on her level, another compartment for your phone just Incase you need to call SOS on this overly hyper child. ( I have an iPhone 6s Plus so you have enough room in there to carry an entire CVS lol ) And another compartment for her bottle.. or beer (;
customer_reviews.author: Marc Ramirez & kristine pabros

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: I liked this so much, I bought two. No frills. Large deep pockets that I’ve always found I have more than enough space for what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for uppababy
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I use it for my uppababy Cruz and it fits perfectly. No complaints about it definitely worth the purchase and wish I would have bought it sooner
customer_reviews.author: Lizette

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for City Mini Double with some creativity
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for my City Mini GT double. I used a bungee cord to create a middle bar and was able to hang both of these on the handle perfectly. I love the zip off pouch to hold keys and other valuables.
customer_reviews.author: KRB

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: It fits on the Vista (2015), but not very well. And when you have the front pocket filled with stuff (we put sunblock in there) the whole organizer tips forward because of the weird weight distribution. It's really too bad there aren't options that are more firmly attached by metal or plastic for the Vista instead of organizers that hang by velcro straps.
customer_reviews.author: Dave F

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed for our daily walks! There’s enough space to my daughters cups, toys, my phone and a couple snacks for them so I don’t have bring my big diaper bag everywhere I go
customer_reviews.author: Nicki Tezla

customer_reviews.title: Fits a lot of stuff!! Versatile and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and fits a lot of stuff. Good quality and versatile. I recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Debora B

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: This was made super convenient for us when we take our LO out. It has two cup holders and a space for other items. If you are looking for an organizer, this will do the job.
customer_reviews.author: ED L.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Baby Jogger City Versa
customer_reviews.text: We use this with our Baby Jogger City Versa. It works wonderfully. Easily holds two starbucks cups - just make sure the get the green things that prevent the coffee from spilling when you go over every bump. This has more than amble room for keys, a wallet, a garage door opener, phone, two starbucks, and anything else you might need. I use the extra zipper pouch to store an extra diaper for "just in case".
customer_reviews.author: M. Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful - fits uppababy cruz stroller and firmly holds Starbucks ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful - fits uppababy cruz stroller and firmly holds Starbucks venti cup or tervis 32 oz insulated tumbler. Like this better than clip-on holder because it doesn't stick out making stroller wider. No fear of hook breaking or spilling drink -- sturdy, tight and adjustable. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisP

customer_reviews.title: Great for a Britax B-Agile Stroller
customer_reviews.text: I am using this on a Britax B-Agile stroller and it works great. I am able to easily fit two sippy cups, and there is still room for a toy and keys. The organizer does collapse a bit when there is nothing in it (e.g., does not fully hold shape), but it has not been a problem for me. It was easy to install on the stroller and does not interfere with anything when folding the stroller. The fabric is a nice quality - does not look cheap. I would purchase one again.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Book Reader

customer_reviews.title: great for my Graco Breaze umbrella stroller
customer_reviews.text: I love this neoprene stroller caddy. It easily holds my large water bottle and a large iced Starbucks beverage, plus there is room in the center to hold a child snack cup, keys, phone, etc. It works well on my new Graco Breaze umbrella stroller without getting in the way. It doesn't get in the way when the stroller folds, which is a plus. Taking off one star because I wish it were slightly more rigid on the bottom, but then I probably couldn't fold the stroller with it on. Overall, great purchase. Worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: ATXMOM

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Compact and the same time fits all needs. Good quality and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia Fryer

customer_reviews.title: Essential addition to any stroller
customer_reviews.text: One size fits all. Perfect for keeping the essentials close as well as 2 spots for beverages.
customer_reviews.author: Emmy D

customer_reviews.title: Fits Bugaboo Bee
customer_reviews.text: It serves its purpose of keeping baby wipes, keys, cell phone, all within reach. It fits nicely on my Bugaboo Bee. The platinum color matches with the Bugaboo extended breezy sun canopy. I like this much better than the Bugaboo organizer which I felt kept items too low and just out of reach. I do wish it had some sort of zipper or lid for stuff that I want to keep in it while unfolding/folding the stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Multi-use Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product to use with a baby stroller and for my mother's walker. I also found that it can be used for traveling on the airplane. Strap it on to the seat in front of you (meal tray) and you can place your phone, water bottle, ear phones, snacks, etc during long flights.
customer_reviews.author: pohaku75

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Not that sterdy. Moves alot on stroller. Cup holder always spills my starbuck drink
customer_reviews.author: Sule Ch

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and simple
customer_reviews.text: Much better than a different stroller organizer I had ordered. The other had long floppy velcro attachments and was big and cumbersome. This one is sleek, simple, and functional. Enough space to hold necessities like keys, wallet, phone and water. Wish I had bought this first so I wouldn't have wasted $30 on the other one.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great for Uppababy Cruz!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use on my Uppababy Cruz stroller and it works perfectly. The Storage capacity is great, it doesn't move down the handles with weight/movement and you don't have to remove it to fold the stroller. Exactly what I needed. I haven't found much use for the wristlet feature, but I'm sure it will come in handy at some point!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: I think this product works pretty well. I wish the drink holders were a little larger, but I can usually fit what I want. My one major concern is that when you have a drink in the drink compartment that does not have a seal tight lid, like a coffee, the organizer does not hold them flat so as the stroller bumps along, it will splash some of the drink out (usually it just stays on the lid).
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Organizer is OK
customer_reviews.text: This organizer is OK. I like the fabric, because I didn't want anything stiff with wire (wire always breaks when I close stroller). I like the velcro straps on the sides (many other have wide velcro straps or clips straps which I don't like). It's not flimsy. My biggest complaint is that it needs another zipper pocket inside the main compartment. The only zipper pocket is the front which is small. I have no place to put other small baby items in a zippered pocket. Also, it would be good if there was a flap to cover the middle for protection/security of items. Not a bad organizer, just wish there were a few more things added to it.
customer_reviews.author: 4fam

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I have a Bugaboo bee stroller & was looking for a stroller organizer that fits with the colors & style of my stroller. I received my order in two days & was very surprised when I opened my package. The material is so soft & it’s a matte black..matches perfectly with the colors of my stroller. Very happy I made this purchase. Does it’s job & makes shopping with a toddler so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great gift/purse for a stroller.
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect addition to a stroller. It has as many zippers and pouches as my purse, which means I lose things in it, but that means there I always know where they are also. Holds coffee, baby bottle water bottle, tissues, etc
customer_reviews.author: GerberDaisy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and fits will on my Graco Jogger stroller
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and fits will on my Graco Jogger stroller. I also like the zip pouch that you can remove so if you walk away from the stroller, you can take it with you and the strap will go around your wrist. This little pouch fits my keys, phone and small wallet and it's a little stretchy also so you can probably have something bigger in there and it would still zip closed.
customer_reviews.author: DCM

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my uppababy vista. I love the removable pouch. The drink slots are bigger than expected and easily holds my full 32oz hydroflask.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Love this organizer!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best stroller organizer I've found. It's easy to install and use. There are three sections in the big pouch, and the side sections hold up cups pretty well. I LOVE the front zip off little pouch, perfect for carrying my phone, money and keys inside when I park the stroller and walk off with the kids. It doesn't get in the way when I fold up the stroller. Overall a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with uppababy
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it's a good holder thing but REALLY didn't work with my uppa babystroller
customer_reviews.author: Ashley K

customer_reviews.title: Nice!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Fits cell phone, keys, water bottle and snacks. My uppababy Cruze stoker even folds without taking it off. Great product for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Stroller Organizer
customer_reviews.text: This fits great on the Uppababy Vista stroller. I had an ice coffee and water bottle with plenty of room in the organizer. It keeps everything level and stays put.
customer_reviews.author: Kara Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Not for the Uppababy strollers
customer_reviews.text: I loved the idea of this stroller organizer, but it doesn't work with the Uppababy strollers. You can fit it on there, but it falls at an agle. So, I'd worry about spilling every time I put drinks in there. Also the slots for the drinks don't really work for latte cups, as they'd squish them. That said, it would be fine for bottled drinks or drinks in more sturdy, non-disposable cups that wouldn't be squished by the neoprene. Also, having the wristlet is pretty convenient. So, think about features are important to you before buying.
customer_reviews.author: Arya

customer_reviews.title: Super functional and the pockets are nice and big to ...
customer_reviews.text: Super functional and the pockets are nice and big to hold all sorts of things I need during walks or hikes. One obvious issue: the zipper to unzip the pouch and the zipper that zips OFF the pouch are both on the same side. So, it's REALLY easy to accidentally zip the pouch OFF when you intended to OPEN it. It zips off VERY easily, for better or worse. I'd still recommend it! We have a Bumbleride Indie and this is indispensable.
customer_reviews.author: neap24

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my city select
customer_reviews.text: I decided to get this one because the price is so much cheaper than the baby jogger parent console and It is amazing I think is so much better than the baby jogger. The fabric is so good, looks so cute on my stroller, too many space for 2 bottles, my wallet, my phone and my cup and the size is really compact. Great product I totally recommend it
customer_reviews.author: celeste

customer_reviews.title: This is a great stroller organizer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great stroller organizer. Keeps all my stuff organized and at my fingertips and the zip-on pouch is great for money and cell phone at a place (like an amusement park) where you'd need to take those things with you when you leave your stroller unattended. Sometimes the drink pouch can be a little unstable so be sure you have lids.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: A must have for your stroller!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this caddy on my Britax stroller for 4 months now and absolutely love it! It fits perfectly on my stroller and holds everything I need it to. I love the designated place for a water bottle or beverage so it does not tip. The removable zipper pocket is also convenient. I also love that I do not have to remove this each time I fold up my stroller. A must have!
customer_reviews.author: Rachilia

customer_reviews.title: Great storage, life saver and fits perfectly for an ...
customer_reviews.text: Great storage, life saver and fits perfectly for an uppababay. Not for coffee cuts that can spill but everythkng else fits great. We got a separate one for coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient!
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite purchases! Love this when we go to the grocery store I don’t have to bring in my purse just grab my card and put it in the zipper and my keys in the pouch.
customer_reviews.author: Terra Clayton

customer_reviews.title: Extra storage and keeps items within reach
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great addition to our stroller! It keeps things close at hand, vs having everything under the seat. We haven’t tried out the insulated cup holder function yet but are loving it overall.
customer_reviews.author: eliz s

customer_reviews.title: it looks great and doesn't tear after a lot of use
customer_reviews.text: It's okay, it looks great and doesn't tear after a lot of use, only downfall is you can only really put water bottles in the cup holders without having to worry if they'll spill. 2 of my Starbucks venti cups got stuck and spilled.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Great to have for holding mommy stuff to access quickly!!
customer_reviews.text: I love having this on my stroller as our Uppababy Vista didn’t have anywhere to hold my phone or water bottle. The only minor issue is how well it stays on that handle.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth S.

customer_reviews.title: Love this definitely recommend (:
customer_reviews.text: Love this not to big not to small, my phone and wallet fit perfectly fine!
customer_reviews.author: Paola_jayyy

customer_reviews.title: Generally I like minimalistic design but it could be a bit bigger ...
customer_reviews.text: Generally I like minimalistic design but it could be a bit bigger and better secured. My 18 months boy has no problem to reach face cream or iPhone from the bag while it is attached to the stroller
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: I really like the design of this and the detachable wallet is great. The only reason I gave 4 stars is it doesn’t sit well on my stroller due to the cup holder/storage compartment on my stroller. I have the graco admiral and this isn’t a good fit for it. I’m hoping it fits my other stroller better.
customer_reviews.author: vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Functional bag
customer_reviews.text: Great add on to stroller for parents items and baby items like wet wipes and antibacterial spray that you don’t want to bend down for! Also stores baby’s water cup and/or coffee cup!
customer_reviews.author: One bit twobit

customer_reviews.title: This is a MUST HAVE for my umbrella stroller!
customer_reviews.text: This fits perfectly on my Maclaren Techno XT. It has plenty of room for drinks, keys, phone, and a few extra small items. The drinks are easy to put in and get out and haven't spilled a drink yet! Easily fits a 1 liter water bottle. I love the extra removable pouch as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Wish I bought this sooner!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my City Mini GT, and I wish I had purchased this first rather than the baby jogger version (which I find bulky and constantly in the way). This is a perfect fit, its slimline and does not get in the way! easily removed with the velcro straps as opposed to the press studs on the baby jogger one. love it!
customer_reviews.author: kikicoco

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking.
customer_reviews.text: Ok for holding phone, etc. drinks are another story. Water bottles are fine but even a small coffee or anything with a lid is sketchy at best. Needs to clear handle of stroller to work as intended, it's too floppy.
customer_reviews.author: Henley

customer_reviews.title: lots of utility
customer_reviews.text: We purchased for each stroller. It is a great bag because it can securely hold two drinks...your morning coffee and your LOs tumbler or sippy cup without worrying that they will spill. Plus a great detachable wristlet and great easy access in between the space where it can hold the 2 drinks.
customer_reviews.author: handj

customer_reviews.title: Love it so much I bought a second one!
customer_reviews.text: It holds everything you need for walks, shopping or just quick errands!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... my 1st child on my Britex stroller and I loved it. I have given this product 3 stars ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this stroller organizer with my 1st child on my Britex stroller and I loved it. I have given this product 3 stars because it says its universal for all strollers but unfortunately it doesn't work on my new Cybex stroller. Had to return and order a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Justine

customer_reviews.title: I like it (and it's good quality) but I do feel ...
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for a small organizer for our double stroller, and this one worked out. It's not too big, but it is big enough to hold keys, a phone or two, and two bottles. I like it (and it's good quality) but I do feel like it's a little overpriced. That's my only qualm!
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my City select stroller and it has worked out perfectly for us. It is the perfect size for what we need.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT!
customer_reviews.text: I have the UPPABABY stroller and so I got the UPPABABY Parent Organizer. There isn't enough space to hold anything other than a phone and a drink which you still have to keep one hand on because it's flimsy. This organizer is PERFECT! Deep pockets, soft and out of your way. I LOVE IT. I've already talked a handful of people into getting it!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth C.

customer_reviews.title: perfect for what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: perfect size, holds everything well, very sturdy exactly the product I wanted
customer_reviews.author: SteffieK

customer_reviews.title: Works well on my Baby Jogger City Mini (way better than the actual city mini holder)
customer_reviews.text: Works well on my Baby Jogger City Mini (way better than the actual city mini holder). The little zipper pouch works well for holding my two big bag clips.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie S

customer_reviews.title: Skip it.
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than it looks, in the way, and almost never used,..
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Holds up well to “stroller life”. Stays up and doesn’t sag like another one I had previously. Very happy with the product!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Wells

customer_reviews.title: Does what it’s suppose to do! Holding up well!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use with my Upoababy Cruz and it has been holding up well after a year of use. It’s be really useful for holding drinks and napkins. I also put my cellphone and keys in it when I’m out and about. It’s made of durable neoprene and the velcro straps is quite string! I highly recommend it over the other organizers which lose their shape over time.
customer_reviews.author: Mommyandme

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect on my safety first stroller. I did purchase to use with double stroller and while it fits the double stroller on one side it doesn't stretch the width of the double stroller. But it is ideal for regular stroller. I bought it to store snacks for easy access for toddler
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: Nice organizer
customer_reviews.text: This fit our city mini well. Pleased with the quality. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Great for my umbrella stroller
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Great for my umbrella stroller. Holds large cups and the zip off pouch is great for amusement parks. Keep your money, phone & chapstick in it, zip it off and wear it on your wrist for rides.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, but doesnt fit well with my UppaBaby Vista
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a nice product, but hangs really awkwardly with my UppaBaby Vista.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I love this ! Great for my cell, gel álcohol and much more!
customer_reviews.author: Lucca De Sousa

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller organizer!
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect addition to our stroller for our trip to Disney. We used a deluxe lightweight stroller so having the extra space up top for bottled waters, my daughters autograph book, wipes, hand sanitizer, sunscreen, etc. was perfect. The quality was great as well. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rocco Paladino

customer_reviews.title: It’s great for small things
customer_reviews.text: It’s great for small things, your phone, keys etc! And maybe will hold a small water bottle in the cup portion. Starbucks iced coffee cups don’t fit too well.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Perez

customer_reviews.title: Great for UPPA baby G-Lite stroller
customer_reviews.text: Compact organizer works well for our UPPA baby G-lite stroller. The slim velcro straps do not interfere with the button enabling the folding mechanism. Many other organizers have much wider straps which would interfere. The cup holders on either end of the organizer are neoprene but not lined with wire (the middle section is lined) so they can bend inward when the stroller is folded and keep the overall footprint slim unlike organizers that have wire throughout. Ample storage in middle compartment (easily holds sippy cup or wallet or phone) and zippered compartment (also good for smaller phone or keys) just in front is a plus. No complaints whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to any stroller!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is pretty great. Fairly priced compared to other major stores, and pretty durable. It holds my 16oz yeti cup perfectly without seeming off balance. The straps are quite sturdy as well.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Kittok

product_meta.title: Skip Hop Universal Stroller Organizer: Insulated Beverage and Essentials Stroller Caddy, Black
product_meta.description:
Color:Black

This insulated beverage and essentials caddy stretches to hold bottles and coffee cups securely, while providing easy access to your most important items. Fitting most stroller bars and handles, this organizer bag includes a detachable wristlet for errands and a headphone port for hands-free calls.

Sturdy neoprene material
Adjustable straps fit most strollers
Fits on both stroller bars and stroller handles
Insulated drink holders stretch to fit most cup and bottle s
Zip-off wristlet to use independently
Open back pocket for easy-access items
Easily folds with umbrella strollers
Includes opening for headphone cord Machine washable
Phthalate-free
Size (inches): 16l x 3w x 6h



BRAND STORY
By Skip Hop
feature_bullets: This insulated cup holder and essentials stroller caddy stretches to hold bottles and coffee cups securely, while providing easy access to your most important items.
Fitting most stroller bars and handles, this universal stroller organizer bag includes a detachable wristlet for errands and a headphone port for hands-free calls.
Insulated cup holders stretch to fit most cup and bottles
Stroller organizer folds easily with umbrella strollers
Zippered pockets to hold valuables and detachable wristlet for errands on-the-go
